Name: Honorine
description:
Honorine is 49 years old, married, and the mother of three children, two of whom already live independently. She has a permanent home in a rural neighborhood. Her spouse is a farmer.

Honorine has a business selling used clothes. To support her business, she decided to take out a new loan with Vahatra. Honorine has been a Vahatra partner for a few months. She was able to buy a cart with the profits from her previous loan.

With this new loan, she will support her used clothing business and grow peppers with her money. She will buy two bales of used bedcovers and pepper seeds with organic manure. She hopes to make a good profit from her business. She will sell her peppers at the city's market and she will save her profits. She plans on buying a parcel of land in the future.
